item.title: 🎉 Congratulations! Wenxuan Wu’s paper has been accepted by the top conference in computer vision, ICCV! ✨
item.description:
📢 Congratulations to our lab member Wenxuan Wu, whose paper has been officially accepted by the prestigious conference International Conference on Computer Vision (ICCV)! 🎊

🎊 Once again, congratulations to Wenxuan Wu! Wishing you continued breakthroughs and great achievements on your academic journey! 🚀

item.title: 🎉 Congratulations! Jiakun Xu’s paper has been accepted by the top conference in medical image computing, MICCAI! ✨
item.description:
📢 Congratulations to our lab member Jiakun Xu, whose paper has been officially accepted by the prestigious conference Medical Image Computing and Computer Assisted Intervention (MICCAI)! 🎊

🎊 Once again, congratulations to Jiakun Xu! Wishing you continued breakthroughs and great achievements on your academic journey! 🚀

item.title: 🎉 Congratulations! Jiyu Qian’s paper has been accepted by the top conference on face and gesture recognition! ✨
item.description:
📢 Congratulations to our lab member Jiyu Qian, whose paper has been officially accepted by the CCFC conference IEEE Conference on Face and Gesture Recognition (FG)! 🎊

🎊 Once again, congratulations to Jiyu Qian! Wishing you continued breakthroughs and great achievements on your academic journey! 🚀

item.title: 🎉 Congratulations to Jiayan Lyu and Ruiyue Chen on their CMIG Paper Acceptance! ✨
item.description:
📢 Congratulations to Jiayan Lyu and Ruiyue Chen from our lab! Their collaborative paper with The Fifth Affiliated Hospital of Sun Yat-sen University has been officially accepted by the JCR Q1 journal Computerized Medical Imaging and Graphics (CMIG)! 🎊

🏆 Journal Information

📚 Journal Name: Computerized Medical Imaging and Graphics (CMIG)
🌟 Ranking: JCR Q1
🔎 Research Area: Medical Imaging and Computer Graphics
